thread.section_title: HandmadePiece Art 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 HandmadePiece Art 的点评意见 | www.handmadepiece.com
thread.title: Tracy Wegenast
thread.title_full: HandmadePiece Art 的点评人 Tracy Wegenast

author: Tracy Wegenast
title: Tracy Wegenast
text: I placed an order for 2 Pierre Auguste Renoir "The Bather" scenes. I wasn't sure about size. The artist called me to suggest the sizes to me. Since I really didn't know what I was doing here, I trusted them. Over a month later, I received an email asking me to proof the paintings. I was SHOCKED at how real they looked. As soon as they arrived, I showed EVERYONE and they could not believe the oil painting quality, and how I can just place an order on-line for one of the classiest works of art I could find and it actually arrives. I will cherish these FOREVER!
